DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether human menstrual blood-derived stem cell effective treatment infection H7N9 virus cause acute lung injury .
DOC.brief_title: Using Human Menstrual Blood Cells Treat Acute Lung Injury Caused H7N9 Bird Flu Virus Infection
DOC.detailed_description: 1. recruit volunteer H7N9 infection : age > 18 ; patient sign informed consent ; APACHE II > 20 score 2. patient infused menstrual blood progenitor cell infusion dose : 1~10Ã—10*7 cells/kg infusion frequency : 2 time week , 2 week infusion 3. test item standard spirit lift ; pulmonary function improve ; lung image injury improve
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis H7N9 infection must critical injured lung tissue cancer diseases pregnancy mental disorder allergic constitution severe inflammation
